${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.NAME: Caressing Moonlight
${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!. NL Trigger all ${modID}:Dot of the target.

${modID}:FlorephemeralDreamflux.NAME: Florephemeral Dreamflux
${modID}:FlorephemeralDreamflux.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!. NL Randomly exhaust 2 cards.

${modID}:HighPoles.NAME: High Poles
${modID}:HighPoles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!. NL Cause fire ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration!.

${modID}:ItsMagicIaddSomeMagic.NAME: It's Magic, I Add SomeMagic
${modID}:ItsMagicIaddSomeMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! . NL Deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage when any enemy's health is under 50% by this damage.

${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.NAME: Slashed Dream Cries In Red
${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.DESCRIPTION: You can't play this card until you have 9 ${modID}:Slashed_Dreams. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:StardustAce.NAME: Stardust Ace
${modID}:StardustAce.DESCRIPTION: Choose: attack one or attack all .

${modID}:RIPHomeRun.NAME: RIP Home Run
${modID}:RIPHomeRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! .

${modID}:TwilightTrill.NAME: Twilight Trill
${modID}:TwilightTrill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Cause lightning ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration!.

${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.NAME: All-Out Footlight Parade
${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.DESCRIPTION: When attack enemy targets that are in the ${modID}:Weakness_Broken state, the Toughness Reduction of this attack will be converted into 1 instance of Super Break DMG.

${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.NAME: String Sings Slow Swirls
${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate.NL Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%.

${modID}:VictoryRush.NAME: Victory Rush
${modID}:VictoryRush.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy is inflicted with ${modID}:Weakness_Break, deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage and ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!.

${modID}:AwaitingSystemResponse.NAME: Awaiting System Response...
${modID}:AwaitingSystemResponse.DESCRIPTION: When attack, apply a random DEBUFF in weak/vulnerable/-2 strength this turn to enemy.

${modID}:BleakBreedsBliss.NAME: Bleak Breeds Bliss
${modID}:BleakBreedsBliss.DESCRIPTION: When health is under half, heal the amount of unblocked damage when attacked.

${modID}:DifficultyPaying.NAME: Difficulty Paying
${modID}:DifficultyPaying.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL The target get 50% more ${modID}:Follow-Up damage. Every 3 times you attack the enemy, draw a card.

${modID}:EverBurningAmber.NAME: Ever Burning Amber
${modID}:EverBurningAmber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! Block. NL Apply !M! weak to all enemies.

${modID}:FiendImpeachmentOfEvil.NAME: Fiend Impeachment Of Evil
${modID}:FiendImpeachmentOfEvil.DESCRIPTION: Enemies get Weak and loss 2 strength this turn.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Randomly add 3 ${modID}:SAM cards to your deck. You can choose one of them to add to your hand immediately.
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Randomly add 3 upgraded ${modID}:SAM cards to your deck. You can choose one of them to add to your hand immediately.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVDeathstarOverload.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Deathstar Overload
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVDeathstarOverload.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card and heal !M! .

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVPyrogenicDecimatio.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Pyrogenic Decimation
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVPyrogenicDecimatio.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card.

${modID}:ChrysalidPyronexus.NAME: Chrysalid Pyronexus
${modID}:ChrysalidPyronexus.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card and gain !M! block.

${modID}:DeltaOrderMeteoricIncineration.NAME: Î” Order: Meteoric Incineration
${modID}:DeltaOrderMeteoricIncineration.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card and cause fire ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration!.

${modID}:OrderAerialBombardment.NAME: Order: Aerial Bombardment
${modID}:OrderAerialBombardment.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

${modID}:OrderFlarePropulsion.NAME: Order: Flare Propulsion
${modID}:OrderFlarePropulsion.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 2 cards.

${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.NAME: Petals To Stream, Repose In Dream
${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.DESCRIPTION: Extend the duration of enemies' ${modID}:Weakness_Broken for one turn.

${modID}:TheHeroWithAThousandFaces.NAME: The Hero With A Thousand Faces
${modID}:TheHeroWithAThousandFaces.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy and discard 1 non-attack card when drawn NL Draw !M! cards when move into discard pile.

${modID}:VoxHarmoniqueOpusCosmique.NAME: Vox Harmonique Opus Cosmique
${modID}:VoxHarmoniqueOpusCosmique.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 cards in your draw pile, set their costs to 0 and put them in the top of the draw pile.
